firms.name: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z)
firms.notes: One of the largest VC firms ($90B AUM, $15B raised Jan 2026). Recent AI: Thinking Machines Lab $2B, Mirelo $41M, Unconventional AI $475M, Hippocratic AI $126M, Cursor, Harvey, xAI $6B rounds, Safe Superintelligence. Full-stack approach with dedicated crypto ($7.6B), American Dynamism ($1.2B), Bio ($700M) funds.
